tool.name: dbsearch.golm
tool.description: Search GCMS spectra from msp files into Golm Metabolome database
tool.command: golm_soap_galaxy.r xfunction golmsearch mspfilevar $imagemsp rivar $rivar riwindowvar $riwindowvar columnvar $columnvar maxhitsvar $maxhitsvar

param.name: imagemsp
param.label: metaMS msp file
param.help: msp output file from metaMS.runGC function

param.name: rivar
param.label: ri
param.help: ri of the search spectra (do not change)

param.name: maxhitsvar
param.label: maxHits
param.help: maximum number of hits per queried spectra, default=all
